name: ecclesiastically
content:

in a way that relates to the Christian religion, or to its church leaders or officials: He led an ecclesiastically uneventful life as a vicar in the Church of England. The system for helping the poor was, to a great extent, ecclesiastically controlled. Related word
ecclesiastical
